verses.verse: Now these are the heads <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H3187><s%>, and this is the genealogy of them that went up <S%H5927><s%> with me from Babylon <S%H894><s%>, in the reign <S%H4438><s%> of Artaxerxes <S%H783><s%> the king <S%H4438><s%>:

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Phinehas <S%H6372><s%>, Gershom <S%H1647><s%>. Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%>, Daniel <S%H1840><s%>. Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, Hattush <S%H2407><s%>.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shecaniah <S%H7935><s%>, of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Parosh <S%H6551><s%>, Zechariah <S%H2148><s%>; and with him were reckoned by genealogy <S%H3187><s%> of the males <S%H2145><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>.
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Pahath-moab <S%H6355><s%>, Eliehoenai <S%H454><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zerahiah <S%H2228><s%>; and with him two hundred <S%H3967><s%> males <S%H2145><s%>.
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shecaniah <S%H7935><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jahaziel <S%H3166><s%>; and with him three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> males <S%H2145><s%>.
And of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Adin <S%H5720><s%>, Ebed <S%H5651><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jonathan <S%H3129><s%>; and with him fifty <S%H2572><s%> males <S%H2145><s%>.
And of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elam <S%H5867><s%>, Jeshaiah <S%H3470><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Athaliah <S%H6271><s%>; and with him seventy <S%H7657><s%> males <S%H2145><s%>.
And of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shephatiah <S%H8203><s%>, Zebadiah <S%H2069><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Michael <S%H4317><s%>; and with him fourscore <S%H8084><s%> males <S%H2145><s%>.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joab <S%H3097><s%>, Obadiah <S%H5662><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehiel <S%H3171><s%>; and with him two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and eighteen <S%H8083><s%> males <S%H2145><s%>.
And of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shelomith <S%H8019><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josiphiah <S%H3131><s%>; and with him a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and threescore <S%H8346><s%> males <S%H2145><s%>.

And of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bebai <S%H893><s%>, Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bebai <S%H893><s%>; and with him twenty <S%H6242><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> males <S%H2145><s%>.

And of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Azgad <S%H5803><s%>, Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hakkatan <S%H6997><s%>; and with him a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> males <S%H2145><s%>.

And of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Adonikam <S%H140><s%>, that were the last <S%H314><s%>; and these are their names <S%H8034><s%>: Eliphelet <S%H467><s%>, Jeuel <S%H3273><s%>, and Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>; and with them threescore <S%H8346><s%> males <S%H2145><s%>.
And of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bigvai <S%H902><s%>, Uthai <S%H5793><s%> and Zabbud <S%H2072><s%>; and with them seventy <S%H7657><s%> males <S%H2145><s%>.

And I gathered them together <S%H6908><s%> to the river <S%H5104><s%> that runneth <S%H935><s%> to Ahava <S%H163><s%>; and there we encamped <S%H2583><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>: and I viewed <S%H995><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, and the priests <S%H3548><s%>, and found <S%H4672><s%> there none of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>.

Then sent <S%H7971><s%> I for Eliezer <S%H461><s%>, for Ariel <S%H740><s%>, for Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>, and for Elnathan <S%H494><s%>, and for Jarib <S%H3402><s%>, and for Elnathan <S%H494><s%>, and for Nathan <S%H5416><s%>, and for Zechariah <S%H2148><s%>, and for Meshullam <S%H4918><s%>, chief men <S%H7218><s%>; also for Joiarib <S%H3114><s%>, and for Elnathan <S%H494><s%>, who were teachers <S%H995><s%>.

And I sent <S%H6680><s%> them forth <S%H3318><s%> unto Iddo <S%H112><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> at the place <S%H4725><s%> Casiphia <S%H3703><s%>; and I told <S%H7760><s%> them what <S%H1697><s%> they should say <S%H1696><s%> unto Iddo <S%H112><s%>, and his brethren <S%H251><s%> the Nethinim <S%H5411><s%>, at the place <S%H4725><s%> Casiphia <S%H3703><s%>, that they should bring <S%H935><s%> unto us ministers <S%H8334><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>.

And according to the good <S%H2896><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%> upon us they brought <S%H935><s%> us a man <S%H376><s%> of discretion <S%H7922><s%>, of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Mahli <S%H4249><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and Sherebiah <S%H8274><s%>, with his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, eighteen <S%H8083><s%>;
and Hashabiah <S%H2811><s%>, and with him Jeshaiah <S%H3470><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>, his brethren <S%H251><s%> and their sons <S%H1121><s%>, twenty <S%H6242><s%>;

and of the Nethinim <S%H5411><s%>, whom David <S%H1732><s%> and the princes <S%H8269><s%> had given <S%H5414><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> Nethinim <S%H5411><s%>: all of them were mentioned <S%H5344><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%>.

Then I proclaimed <S%H7121><s%> a fast <S%H6685><s%> there <S%H5104><s%>, at the river Ahava <S%H163><s%>, that we might humble <S%H6031><s%> ourselves before <S%H6440><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, to seek <S%H1245><s%> of him a straight <S%H3477><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> for us <S%H2945><s%>, and for our little ones, and for all our substance <S%H7399><s%>.

For I was ashamed <S%H954><s%> to ask <S%H7592><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> a band of soldiers <S%H2428><s%> and horsemen <S%H6571><s%> to help <S%H5826><s%> us against the enemy <S%H341><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>, because we had spoken <S%H559><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The hand <S%H3027><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%> is upon all them that seek <S%H1245><s%> him <S%H2896><s%>, for good; but his power <S%H5797><s%> and his wrath <S%H639><s%> is against all them that forsake him <S%H5800><s%>.
So we fasted <S%H6684><s%> and besought <S%H1245><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> for this <S%H6279><s%>: and he was entreated of us.

Then I set apart <S%H914><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> of the chiefs <S%H8269><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%>, even Sherebiah <S%H8274><s%>, Hashabiah <S%H2811><s%>, and ten <S%H6235><s%> of their brethren with them <S%H251><s%>,

and weighed <S%H8254><s%> unto them the silver <S%H3701><s%>, and the gold <S%H2091><s%>, and the vessels <S%H3627><s%>, even the offering <S%H8641><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>, which the king <S%H4428><s%>, and his counsellors <S%H3289><s%>, and his princes <S%H8269><s%>, and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> there present <S%H4672><s%>, had offered <S%H7311><s%>:

I weighed <S%H8254><s%> into their hand <S%H3027><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> talents <S%H3603><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and silver <S%H3701><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> talents <S%H3603><s%>; of gold <S%H2091><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> talents <S%H3603><s%>;

and twenty <S%H6242><s%> bowls <S%H3713><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, of a thousand <S%H505><s%> darics <S%H150><s%>; and two <S%H8147><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> of fine <S%H2896><s%> bright brass <S%H5178><s%>, precious <S%H2532><s%> as gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And I said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H6944><s%>, Ye are holy unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and the vessels <S%H3627><s%> are holy <S%H6944><s%>; and the silver <S%H3701><s%> and the gold <S%H2091><s%> are a freewill-offering <S%H5071><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%>.

Watch <S%H8245><s%> ye <S%H8104><s%>, and keep them <S%H8254><s%>, until ye weigh them before <S%H6440><s%> the chiefs <S%H8269><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, and the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, in the chambers <S%H3957><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

So the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> received <S%H6901><s%> the weight <S%H4948><s%> of the silver <S%H3701><s%> and the gold <S%H2091><s%>, and the vessels <S%H3627><s%>, to bring <S%H935><s%> them to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>.

Then we departed <S%H5265><s%> from the river <S%H5104><s%> Ahava <S%H163><s%> on the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> day of the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, to go <S%H3212><s%> unto Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: and the hand <S%H3027><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%> was upon us <S%H5337><s%>, and he delivered us from the hand <S%H3709><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%> and the lier-in <S%H693><s%>-wait by the way <S%H1870><s%>.
And we came <S%H935><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and abode <S%H3427><s%> there three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

And on the fourth <S%H7243><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> and the gold <S%H2091><s%> and the vessels <S%H3627><s%> were weighed <S%H8254><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Meremoth <S%H4822><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uriah <S%H223><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>; and with him was Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Phinehas <S%H6372><s%>; and with them was Jozabad <S%H3107><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>, and Noadiah <S%H5129><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Binnui <S%H1131><s%>, the Levite <S%H3881><s%>;
the whole by number <S%H4557><s%> and by weight <S%H4948><s%>: and all the weight <S%H4948><s%> was written <S%H3789><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%>.

The children <S%H1121><s%> of the captivity <S%H1473><s%>, that were come out <S%H935><s%> of exile <S%H7628><s%>, offered <S%H7126><s%> burnt-offerings <S%H5930><s%> unto the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%> for all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, ninety <S%H8673><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>, seventy <S%H7657><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%> he-goats <S%H6842><s%> for a sin-offering <S%H2403><s%>: all this was a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And they delivered <S%H5414><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>'s commissions <S%H1881><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>'s satraps <S%H323><s%>, and to the governors <S%H6346><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the River <S%H5104><s%>: and they furthered <S%H5375><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.
